meanings.sent1: My brothers and I play soccer together.
meanings.sent2: I have two brothers, one older and one younger.
meanings.sent3: My brothers always steal my snacks, but I still love them.
meanings.sent4: The bond between brothers is unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: Growing up with brothers means never being bored.

meanings.definition: A close male friend or associate.
meanings.sent1: My best friends are like brothers to me.
meanings.sent2: We have been brothers since childhood.
meanings.sent3: Even though we argue, we are still brothers at heart.
meanings.sent4: Brothers stand by each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: Having brothers in life makes everything better.

meanings.definition: Members of a male religious community.
meanings.sent1: The brothers in the monastery lead a life of prayer and service.
meanings.sent2: The brothers gather every morning for meditation.
meanings.sent3: The brothers' chants echoed through the peaceful halls.
meanings.sent4: The brothers' dedication to their faith is inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Living among the brothers brings a sense of peace and purpose.
